hero.headline: # Turn Customer Voice Into Product Reality with Feedback Manager Software
hero.subheadline: Collect feedback from 25+ channels, detect duplicates with AI, engage your community, and convert validated ideas directly into your roadmap. Stop losing feedback in scattered tools.
hero.supporting_text: Join product teams that never miss valuable customer insights and ship what users actually want.

problem.headline: ## The Feedback Black Hole Problem
problem.subheadline: *Great feedback is everywhere. Acting on it is nowhere.*

pain_points.title: **Scattered Everywhere**
pain_points.description: Email, Slack, support tickets, Intercom, surveys, analytics‚Äîfeedback lives in 10 different tools. You know it's there. You can't find it.

pain_points.title: **Duplicates & Noise**
pain_points.description: 20 people request the same feature with different words. You don't realize it's the same request until you've built three different solutions. This supports Free feedback manager software.

pain_points.title: **Lost in Translation**
pain_points.description: Customer feedback sits in one system. Product roadmap lives in another. Nothing connects. Ideas never become features. Customers never know you listened.

problem.subheadline_h3: ### Great feedback is everywhere. Acting on it is nowhere.

solution.headline: ## One System. All Your Feedback. Instant Action.
solution.subheadline: *From capture to conversion‚Äîfeedback management that actually closes the loop*
solution.conclusion: Feedback doesn't disappear. It transforms into shipped features.

workflow.title: Collect From Everywhere
workflow.description: Automatically ingest feedback from 25+ sources: Intercom, Zendesk, Slack, surveys, forms, and more. Native submission portal included.

workflow.title: Detect Duplicates with AI
workflow.description: Smart similarity matching shows related feedback before submission. "This looks 78% similar to..." Consolidate, don't duplicate.

workflow.title: Organize & Prioritize
workflow.description: Custom categories, collections, tags, and status workflows. Vote-based trending. Filter by "rising" or "controversial". Know what matters.

workflow.title: Engage the Community
workflow.description: Voting, commenting, threaded discussions. Users see you're listening. Popular ideas bubble up. Engagement drives validation.

workflow.title: Convert to Work Items
workflow.description: One click: "Turn to Epic", "Turn to Feature", "Connect to Backlog". Validated feedback becomes scheduled work. The loop closes.

workflow.title: Update Customers
workflow.description: Status updates sync automatically. "Under Review" ‚Üí "Planned" ‚Üí "In Development" ‚Üí "Shipped". Customers see progress. Trust builds.

features.headline: Built for Product Teams That Listen

feature_list.title: Multi-Channel Feedback Collection
feature_list.tagline: Capture every voice, wherever it speaks
feature_list.description: Connect 25+ feedback sources: Intercom, Zendesk, ProdPad, Gleap, Slack, Gatherup, surveys, and more. Plus a native feedback portal for direct submission. All feedback flows into one system automatically.

feature_list.title: Smart Duplicate Detection
feature_list.description: Before submitting, users see related ideas with similarity scores. "This looks 78% similar to 'Mobile App Dark Mode'‚Äîvote instead?" Consolidate feedback, avoid fragmentation, understand true demand.

feature_list.title: Community Engagement

feature_list.title: Custom Status Workflows

feature_list.title: Collections & Theme Organization
feature_list.description: Create collections around themes: "Mobile Experience", "Enterprise Features", "Performance Issues". See all related feedback in one view. Generate AI problem summaries and solution proposals.

feature_list.title: Convert to Work Items
feature_list.tagline: From feedback to roadmap in one click
feature_list.description: Select any validated feedback and convert: "Turn to Epic", "Turn to Feature", "Turn to User Story". Or link to existing backlog items. Feedback becomes scheduled work. Customers see it ship.

integrations.headline: 25+ Integrations. One Feedback Hub.
integrations.subheadline: Automatically collect feedback from every channel your customers use

cases.title: ### SaaS Product Team
cases.subtitle: *From 5 fragmented tools to 1 feedback hub*
cases.description: A B2B SaaS company was drowning in feedback. Support tickets in Zendesk, feature requests in Intercom, email threads forwarded to PMs, Slack messages from sales, NPS surveys in Retently. Nothing connected. Features got built based on who shouted loudest, not what mattered most.
cases.solution: With Feedback Manager: All 5 sources auto-sync into one system. Duplicate detection revealed that "SSO Login" was requested by 43 different customers (previously counted as 8). Community voting showed "Advanced Reporting" had 127 votes. Both got prioritized, converted to epics, and shipped. Customers saw status updates throughout.

cases.title: ### Developer Tools Startup
cases.subtitle: *Community-driven roadmap with public voting*
cases.description: A developer tools startup wanted their community to drive the roadmap. They launched a public feedback portal with voting and discussions. Within 3 months, 1,200+ developers submitted ideas and 15,000+ votes cast.
cases.outcome: Top-voted features became the roadmap. "GitHub Actions Integration" had 340 votes‚Äîgot built. "VS Code Extension" had 280 votes‚Äîprioritized next. "Dark Mode" was requested 47 times before duplicate detection‚Äîmerged into single request with 520 total votes. Community saw every status update. Trust and engagement skyrocketed.
key_actions: Launched public feedback portal with embeddable widget
Used duplicate detection to consolidate 47 "dark mode" requests
Converted top 10 voted items to roadmap features

cases.title: ### Enterprise Platform
cases.subtitle: *Internal feedback management across 12 product teams*
cases.description: An enterprise platform with 12 product teams had each team managing feedback differently. No shared visibility. Sales kept requesting features that already existed in other products. Engineering built duplicates across teams.
cases.solution: With Feedback Manager: All teams submit to centralized system with custom categories per product line. Collections group cross-product themes ("Enterprise Security", "API Performance"). Leadership sees all feedback, identifies patterns, prevents duplicate work. Sales sees what's planned across all products.
results: **Sales can search "Is X feature planned?" across all products**
**Custom workflows per product (Ideas: 5 statuses, Issues: 7 statuses)**

questions.question: ### Can customers submit feedback directly?
questions.answer: Yes. You get an embeddable feedback widget, a standalone portal, and direct submission links. Plus you can integrate with 25+ feedback tools customers already use (Intercom, Zendesk, etc.). All submissions flow into one system.

questions.question: ### How does duplicate detection work?
questions.answer: AI-powered natural language matching. When users submit feedback, the system searches existing items and shows similar ones with percentage match scores (e.g., "78% similar to..."). Users can vote on existing items instead of creating duplicates. You can also manually merge related items.

questions.question: ### Can we make our feedback portal public or keep it private?
questions.answer: Both. You control visibility per item or for the entire portal. Public portals let anyone vote and comment (great for community-driven products). Private portals restrict access to invited users only (great for enterprise feedback).

questions.question: ### How does feedback connect to our roadmap?
questions.answer: One-click conversion: "Turn to Epic", "Turn to Feature", "Turn to User Story". Or link feedback to existing backlog items. Once connected, the feedback shows the work item ID. If using auto-sync, status updates from roadmap (Planned ‚Üí In Progress ‚Üí Shipped) automatically update feedback status.

questions.question: ### What are Collections and how do they work?
questions.answer: Collections group related feedback around themes or problem areas (e.g., "Mobile Experience", "Enterprise Security"). One feedback item can belong to multiple collections. Collections can have AI-generated problem summaries and linked solutions. Great for organizing feedback by strategic theme.

questions.question: ### Can we customize status workflows?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Define custom statuses per feedback type (Ideas vs Issues can have different workflows). Example: "Submitted ‚Üí Under Review ‚Üí Planned ‚Üí In Development ‚Üí Shipped". Or use your own stages. Status counts show in sidebar, insights show distribution.

questions.question: ### What integrations are supported?
questions.answer: 25+ including: Intercom, Zendesk, ProdPad, Gleap, Elevio, Gatherup, ProductLane, Zonka Feedback, Retently, Zoho SalesIQ, Langfuse, Flash AI, Slack, plus CSV/JSON import and REST API for custom integrations.

questions.question: ### Can we import existing feedback from spreadsheets?
questions.answer: Yes. Bulk import via CSV or JSON. Map your columns to feedback fields (title, description, category, status, tags). System validates, creates items, and notifies you when complete. Great for migrating from other tools or consolidating historical feedback.
